name: Bild.me kuroi
description: This is a black and green version of the website without all the useless text. This is as simplistic as it gets.

user.name: AntonioKowatsch
user.about:
I'm just an adventurer. Looking for new challenges.
Feel free to contact me if you have any questions.
My fields of expertise are chemistry, physics and penetration testing.

additional_info:
Bild.me is one of my favorite websites, unlike Image shack this website doesn't delete your images. There are no restrictions (size,file-type,quantity...) and the service is available 24/7.
I myself use it for animated GIFs most of the time.
